overview: Xiaoya grew up in a single-parent family, the lack of affection and friendship, made the city girl fall in love with then-boyfriend Wang Hao. On a weekend, Xiaoya, Wang Hao and Jianwen, Mary and several friends of the club resolve to camp on the road encounter a stranger, what appeared to be a camp becomes a terror when Wang Hao mysteriously disappears.
title: Please Keep Away
